Brutus of Alba, or, The enchanted lovers a tragedy acted at the Duke's Theatre / written by N. Tate. Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715. Virgil. Aeneis Liber 4.
[8], 56, [2] p.
Printed by E.F. for Jacob Tonson ..., London : 1678.
First edition. The plan of the play is taken from the fourth book of Virgils Aeneid. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
